Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 20th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1966...
Injured on 6/26/1966 with a Strained Hip Muscle, out for 5 days...
Injured on 4/6/1967 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
Injured on 6/10/1967 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 8/11/1967 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from San Francisco to Chicago (N) on 5/31/1968 (Going to SF: P T. McGraw, 3B R. Santo. Going to CHC: P J. Kern, C J. Harrell)...
Had first career hit on 4/3/1970, off Tommie Sisk (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/1970, off Paul Edmondson (LA)...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Chicago (N) in 1975...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
